name: M3U Editor
short_desc: Full-featured IPTV playlist editor with EPG management
author: sparkison
description: M3U Editor is a comprehensive IPTV management platform featuring playlist editing, EPG (Electronic Program Guide) management, Xtream API output, series management with .strm file support, post-processing with custom scripts/webhooks/email, and much more. Supports M3U, M3U8, M3U+, Xtream codes API, XMLTV files, and Schedules Direct integration for EPG data.

form_fields.label: M3U Proxy API Token
form_fields.hint: Secure authentication token for M3U proxy service
